about_the_game:
Escape from Andromeda is an overhead 2D sci-fi spaceship looter shooter based in a procedurally generated galaxy. In Escape from Andromeda, every planet is a level, and every star is a part of your story.

Mine, trade, battle, customize, and explore your way to the top in Escape from Andromeda.

Mining
Shoot asteroids and pick up their ores to use for repairing and refueling ships. Realistic physics cause impact forces to push asteroids in multiple directions. Use them to help you defeat enemies.

Trading
Complete levels to get the opportunity to salvage valuable equipment. Trade equipment for credits that can be used to purchase even more equipment and ships.

Battle
Engage in intense top-down space faring combat. Projectile placement, speed, size, and range are all taken into account with EFA's complex damage system. Shoot downed enemies to make them explode - and create killchains with the shrapnel.

Customize
Customize your ship and those of two friends with millions of different procedurally generated ship type, weapon, and skin combinations.

Explore
Explore over 5,000 different planets, each with unique levels, asteroid layouts, and enemy encounters. Each new game procedurally generates a different galaxy.

Cooperative Play
Go on a galactic adventure with up to two other players.
